newsitem.title: LATVIA: LATVIA-BOURSE TO LAUNCH INDEX ON APRIL 2.
newsitem.headline: LATVIA-BOURSE TO LAUNCH INDEX ON APRIL 2.

text.p: The stock Exchange said on Friday that it will launch its bourse index on April 2.
"The index from then on will serve as an indicator of Latvia's stock market, also tracking the development trends of its economy," the bourse said in a statement.
The index was prepared in co-operation with Dow Jones, which makes it the first Dow Jones index in the Eastern Europe and former Soviet countries, the bourse said.
"On behalf of the international financial world, the index can also be considered as a sign of trust in the development of Latvia's economy," the statement added.
More detailed information about the index will be issued next week, the bourse said.
The index, based on capitalisation data, is expected to track the top 10 most active stocks on the Riga market.
Latvian commercial bank indices, including Rietumu Bank and Saules bank, were introduced earlier this year.
